faqData.question: What does this ERP system do for rubber manufacturers?
faqData.answer: Our complete ERP software for rubber industry handles procurement, batch production, curing and delivery — integrating all processes into one robust ERP system.

faqData.question: Does the ERP support quality control and compliance in rubber manufacturing?
faqData.answer: Yes, the ERP includes built-in quality checks at every stage of production and helps ensure compliance with industry standards. It also maintains complete traceability of batches, test results and approvals.

faqData.question: Is the ERP flexible for tyre and non-tyre production?
faqData.answer: Absolutely. From tyres to rubber seals, belts and hoses our software for rubber industry is built to support multiple product types.
